meanings.definition: Relating to the origin and development of tissues.
meanings.sent1: The histogenetic process is crucial for understanding how tissues form.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study histogenetic factors to learn more about tissue development.
meanings.sent3: The histogenetic changes in the plant seemed to make it grow faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic skills were histogenetic, evolving from simple sketches to intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The histogenetic nature of the cells was evident under the microscope.
